data.Name: breaks_blocks
data.Description: If true, the explosion will destroy blocks in the explosion radius.

data.Name: causes_fire
data.Description: If true, blocks in the explosion radius will be set on fire.

data.Name: destroy_affected_by_griefing
data.Description: If true, whether the explosion breaks blocks is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

data.Name: fire_affected_by_griefing
data.Description: If true, whether the explosion causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

data.Name: fuse_length
data.Description: The range for the random amount of time the fuse will be lit before exploding, a negative value means the explosion will be immediate.

data.Name: fuse_lit
data.Description: If true, the fuse is already lit when this component is added to the entity.

data.Name: max_resistance
data.Description: A blocks explosion resistance will be capped at this value when an explosion occurs.

data.Name: power
data.Description: The radius of the explosion in blocks and the amount of damage the explosion deals.

data: `max_resistance` is set to a default value of 3.40282e+38. An alternative to using this number is the string "infinite" to achieve the same result.
